title: Sharing Shawny
description: Shawny loves Brace, the way he kisses her, loves her…and dominates her. In the bedroom he is Master and she is slave, outside of it they are equals until Brace’s friend Rowan enters the picture. He wants Shawny, too, on her knees, crawling and yielding to his every whim. Can two dominants learn to share one beautiful and eager submissive or will Shawny be forced to choose the man who will own her body and soul.
author: Reese Gabriel
